name: Neon Jumper (Fedron)
description:
Jump your way up an endless level with countless threats and various platforms.

  • Collect score bubbles to increase your score
  • Avoid Spikes and Spikey balls
  • Climb quicker than the lava but be careful not to fall

Use your acquired points to buy special powerups that will help your climb higher or buy a unique skin for your square!

A and D, or arrow keys to move left and right

W, Up Arrow, or Spacebar to jump.
